Title: Lady Vengeance
Writer: Seo-kyeong Jeong, Chan-wook Park, Chan-wook Park (character created by: Lady Vengeance,  Vengeance Trilogy), Myeong-chan Park (comic)
Actors: Nam-mi Kang, Jeong-nam Choi, Hye-Sook Go, Bok-hwa Baek
Plot: After being wrongfully imprisoned for thirteen years and having her child taken away from her, a woman seeks revenge through increasingly brutal means.
